009package Ch10_FittingLines;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType.Pratt;
012import static imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.geometric.CircleFitGeometric.FitType.DistanceBased;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.gui.Overlay;
017import ij.gui.Roi;
018import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
019import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
020import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
022import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitAlgebraic;
023import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.geometric.CircleFitGeometric;
024import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line.LineFit;
025import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line.LinearRegressionFit;
026import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line.OrthogonalLineFitEigen;
027import imagingbook.common.geometry.line.AlgebraicLine;
028import imagingbook.common.hough.HoughLine;
029import imagingbook.common.ij.RoiUtils;
030import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
031import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
032
033
034/**
035 * Performs line fitting on the point set specified by the current ROI.
036 * 
037 * @author WB
038 *
039 */
040public class Line_Fitting_Roi_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
041        
042        static CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType AlgebraicFitMethod = Pratt;
043        static CircleFitGeometric.FitType GeometricFitMethod = DistanceBased;
044        
045        private static BasicAwtColor RegressionFitColor = BasicAwtColor.Red;
046        private static BasicAwtColor OrthogonalFitColor = BasicAwtColor.Blue;
047        private static double StrokeWidth = 0.5;
048        
049        private ImagePlus im;
050        
051        @Override
052        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
053                this.im = im;
054                return DOES_ALL + ROI_REQUIRED;
055        }
056
057        @Override
058        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
059                Roi roi = im.getRoi();
060                int width = ip.getWidth();
061                int height = ip.getHeight();
062                
063                if (!runDialog()) {
064                        return;
065                }
066                
067                Pnt2d[] points = RoiUtils.getOutlinePointsFloat(roi);
068                IJ.log("Found points " + points.length);
069                if (points.length < 2) {
070                        IJ.error("At least 2 points are required, but found only " + points.length);
071                        return;
072                }
073                
074                Overlay oly = im.getOverlay();
075                if (oly == null) {
076                        oly = new Overlay();
077                        im.setOverlay(oly);
078                }
079                
080                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
081                
082                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
083                LineFit fitO = new OrthogonalLineFitEigen(points);
084                AlgebraicLine lineO = fitO.getLine();
085                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
086                
087                if (lineO == null) {
088                        IJ.log("Orthogonal line fit: no result!");
089                        return;
090                }
091                
092                
093                IJ.log("Orthogonal line fit:");
094                IJ.log("  line: " + lineO.toString());
095//              IJ.log(String.format(Locale.US, "  error = %.3f", initCircle.getMeanSquareError(points)));
096                
097                ColoredStroke orthogonalStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, OrthogonalFitColor.getColor());
098                ola.addShape(new HoughLine(lineO).getShape(width, height), orthogonalStroke);
099
100                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
101                LineFit fitR = new LinearRegressionFit(points);
102                AlgebraicLine lineR = fitR.getLine();
103                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
104                
105                if (lineR == null) {
106                        IJ.log("Regression fit: no result!");
107                        return;
108                }
109                
110                IJ.log("Regression line fit:");
111                IJ.log("  line: " + lineR.toString());
112//              IJ.log(String.format(Locale.US, "  error = %.3f", finalCircle.getMeanSquareError(points)));
113
114
115                ColoredStroke regressionStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, RegressionFitColor.getColor());
116                ola.addShape(new HoughLine(lineR).getShape(width, height), regressionStroke);
117
118        }
119
120        // ------------------------------------------
121        
122        private boolean runDialog() {
123//              GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
124//              gd.addEnumChoice("algebraic fit method", AlgebraicFitMethod);
125//              gd.addEnumChoice("algebraic ellipse color", AlgebraicFitColor);
126//              
127//              gd.addEnumChoice("geometric fit method", GeometricFitMethod);
128//              gd.addEnumChoice("geometric ellipse color", GeometricFitColor);
129//              
130//              gd.showDialog();
131//              if (gd.wasCanceled())
132//                      return false;
133//              
134//              AlgebraicFitMethod = gd.getNextEnumChoice(CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType.class);
135//              AlgebraicFitColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
136//              
137//              GeometricFitMethod = gd.getNextEnumChoice(CircleFitGeometric.FitType.class);
138//              GeometricFitColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
139//              
140                return true;
141        }
142
143
144
145}
